page.title: 06APPLETON ROEBUCK INDUSTRY
page.content: The chief industry is{farming.}It's mainly arable with some intensive pig rearing and fattening of bullocks and sheep.The farms are highly mechanised and employ few labourers. {Service industries}are small scale and light.The schools have 7 teachers and 9 part time ancilliary staff.Three pubs belonging to"Sam Smith's" brewery Tadcaster,have about 20 full and p.t. staff."Sykes'coaches" run a bus service,excursions and private hire with about 10 staff.Some work is provided at the shop /postoffices in the two villages.Some homes employ cleaners.{Appleton}has{tradesmen:}a joiner & undertaker,a plumber,a motor mechanic,an electrician ,a builder. There is a translater and an under water diving school.Bolton has a dental surgery. Most people{commute} to work in Leeds,York and the North.
